comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her grave and death certificate are here: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=27115628 Entry gives her parents names as Miles Osborne Sherrill (1841-1919) and Sarah Ramseur Bost (1848-1930). Her father was a disabled veteran from the Civil War (leg amputee), who worked in state government, including an elected stint as the NC state librarian (1899). Mary Lura was the last of her parents' seven children, born when her mother was 40, her father was 47. Her much older brother Joseph Garland Sherrill (1868-1949) was a military doctor during World War I.
